MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH1 postcode area of Chester, affecting customers on Higher Ferry Lane, Sealand Road, Deeside Lane and surrounding streets . We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 1:46PM. Our engineers have established that there is an underground cable fault and that repairs will be complex. We are awaiting delivery of generators to restore power and this should happen by 9PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:25PM on Sunday 11th April 2021.
